custom-sql.sql: SELECT COUNT(*) AS COUNT_VALUE FROM ExpandoColumn INNER JOIN ExpandoTable ON (ExpandoTable.tableId = ExpandoColumn.tableId) WHERE (ExpandoTable.classNameId = ?) AND (ExpandoTable.name = ?)
SELECT {ExpandoColumn.*} FROM ExpandoColumn INNER JOIN ExpandoTable ON (ExpandoTable.tableId = ExpandoColumn.tableId) WHERE (ExpandoTable.classNameId = ?) AND (ExpandoTable.name = ?)

SELECT {ExpandoColumn.*} FROM ExpandoColumn INNER JOIN ExpandoTable ON (ExpandoTable.tableId = ExpandoColumn.tableId) WHERE (ExpandoTable.classNameId = ?) AND (ExpandoTable.name = ?) AND (ExpandoColumn.name = ?)
SELECT COUNT(*) AS COUNT_VALUE FROM ExpandoRow INNER JOIN ExpandoTable ON (ExpandoTable.tableId = ExpandoRow.tableId) WHERE (ExpandoTable.classNameId = ?) AND (ExpandoTable.name = ?)
SELECT {ExpandoRow.*} FROM ExpandoRow INNER JOIN ExpandoTable ON (ExpandoTable.tableId = ExpandoRow.tableId) WHERE (ExpandoTable.classNameId = ?) AND (ExpandoTable.name = ?)

SELECT {ExpandoRow.*} FROM ExpandoRow INNER JOIN ExpandoTable ON (ExpandoTable.tableId = ExpandoRow.tableId) WHERE (ExpandoTable.classNameId = ?) AND (ExpandoTable.name = ?) AND (ExpandoRow.classPK = ?)

SELECT COUNT(*) AS COUNT_VALUE FROM ExpandoValue INNER JOIN ExpandoRow ON (ExpandoRow.rowId_ = ExpandoValue.rowId_) INNER JOIN ExpandoTable ON (ExpandoTable.tableId = ExpandoRow.tableId) WHERE (ExpandoTable.classNameId = ?) AND (ExpandoTable.name = ?) AND (ExpandoRow.classPK = ?)

SELECT COUNT(*) AS COUNT_VALUE FROM ExpandoValue INNER JOIN ExpandoColumn ON (ExpandoColumn.columnId = ExpandoValue.columnId) INNER JOIN ExpandoTable ON (ExpandoTable.tableId = ExpandoColumn.tableId) WHERE (ExpandoTable.classNameId = ?) AND (ExpandoTable.name = ?) AND (ExpandoColumn.name = ?)

SELECT {ExpandoValue.*} FROM ExpandoValue INNER JOIN ExpandoRow ON (ExpandoRow.rowId_ = ExpandoValue.rowId_) INNER JOIN ExpandoTable ON (ExpandoTable.tableId = ExpandoRow.tableId) WHERE (ExpandoTable.classNameId = ?) AND (ExpandoTable.name = ?) AND (ExpandoRow.classPK = ?)

SELECT {ExpandoValue.*} FROM ExpandoValue INNER JOIN ExpandoColumn ON (ExpandoColumn.columnId = ExpandoValue.columnId) INNER JOIN ExpandoTable ON (ExpandoTable.tableId = ExpandoColumn.tableId) WHERE (ExpandoTable.classNameId = ?) AND (ExpandoTable.name = ?) AND (ExpandoColumn.name = ?)

SELECT {ExpandoValue.*} FROM ExpandoValue INNER JOIN ExpandoRow ON (ExpandoRow.rowId_ = ExpandoValue.rowId_) INNER JOIN ExpandoColumn ON (ExpandoColumn.columnId = ExpandoValue.columnId) INNER JOIN ExpandoTable ON (ExpandoTable.tableId = ExpandoColumn.tableId) WHERE (ExpandoTable.classNameId = ?) AND (ExpandoTable.name = ?) AND (ExpandoColumn.name = ?) AND (ExpandoRow.classPK = ?)

SELECT {ExpandoValue.*} FROM ExpandoValue INNER JOIN ExpandoColumn ON (ExpandoColumn.columnId = ExpandoValue.columnId) INNER JOIN ExpandoTable ON (ExpandoTable.tableId = ExpandoColumn.tableId) WHERE (ExpandoTable.classNameId = ?) AND (ExpandoTable.name = ?) AND (ExpandoColumn.name = ?) AND (ExpandoValue.rowId_ = ?)
